mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EQUIPMENT WHERE CLS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{cls},'%') AND MODEL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{model},'%') AND UID IN ( SELECT UID FROM EQUIPMENT_USER WHERE PN IN ( SELECT PN FROM USER WHERE NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') ) );
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EQUIPMENT(CLS, SN, MODEL, SPEC, WAR_START, WAR_END, MANU_COM, MAC, STATE, YEAR) VALUES (#{cls}, #{sn}, #{model}, #{spec}, #{warStart}, #{warEnd}, #{manuCom}, #{mac}, #{state}, #{year})
mapper.update: UPDATE EQUIPMENT SET CLS = #{cls}, SN = #{sn}, MODEL = #{model}, SPEC = #{spec}, WAR_START = #{warStart}, WAR_END = #{warEnd}, MANU_COM = #{manuCom}, MAC = #{mac}, STATE = #{state}, YEAR = #{year} WHERE UID = #{uid}
